answers.answer: Don't panic, have him checked by his doctor; easy enough to do and then you can set your mind at ease or begin to manage the problem if there is one. Best of luck.

question: My son is 21 months old.  He is constantly thirsty wanting "juice" which is crystal lite. He plays hard outside and I was contributing the thirst this and him just growing. He hasn't lost any weight and his eating habits are the same.  He has maintained a weight of 28 pounds. I don't know if I am sounding like a paranoid mom, but am worried after seeing some of these symptoms. Just worried because I am pregnant with #2 and am starting to panic!!
title: 21 month old son with symptomd of diabetes?
